verses.html:
1
There’s a call comes ringing o’er the restless wave, “Send the light! Send the light!”
There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save, “Send the light! Send the light!”

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine from shore to shore!
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine forevermore!

2
We have heard the Macedonian call today, “Send the light! Send the light!”
And a golden off’ring at the cross we lay, “Send the light! Send the light!”

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine from shore to shore!
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine forevermore!

3
Let us pray that grace may ev’rywhere abound,
Send the light! Send the light!
And a Christ-like spirit ev’rywhere be found,
Send the light! Send the light!

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine from shore to shore!
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine forevermore!

4
Let us not grow weary in the work of love,
Send the light! Send the light!
Let us gather jewels for a crown above,
Send the light! Send the light!

verses.label: 4C
verses.html:
4
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine from shore to shore!
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine forevermore!
